script_execution.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet18 --dataset CIFAR10Idx --dataset-idx ${idx} --k ${k} --exp-mode finetune --dataset-idx-method wrn --exp-name resnet18_idx${idx}_wrn_ratio${k}_adv --trainer adv --val-method adv --source-net results/resnet18/resnet18_idx${idx}_wrn_ratio${k}_adv/prune/latest_exp/checkpoint/model_best.pth.tar --result-dir results
